name: Gravatar ALT & TITLE Fix
author: Andy Ciordia

sections.description:
This plugin solves one very simple problem. WordPress did not include an alt or title tag to go with its gravatar usage. This fixes the problem by pulling the additional info from Gravatar and inserting it into the image alt/title. Fixing a bunch of errors that get generated by SEO reporting tools looking for broken alt/title tags.

Important Notes
sections.installation: Install via WordPress Plugin manager or unzip in wp-content/plugins, activate, refresh (purge cache if necessary) check your source and Gravatar related links should now have proper tagging.

short_description: A simple plugin to insert missing ALT & TITLE tags into your Gravatar image. Author name sourced from Gravatar.
